column4: if I install php5 on my ubuntu gutsy system will that enable me to run php scripts locally as if they were on a server?
uh, "as if they were on a server" - no, you need a server, such as apache2. of course you can then just reach it locally.
otherwise, you can install "php5-cli" and use it as a scripting language like many - but nothing to do with the web
